thread.title: Amon Amarth Bringing Viking Ship To Chicago Open Air Festival [News]
thread.title_full: Amon Amarth Bringing Viking Ship To Chicago Open Air Festival [News]

title: Amon Amarth Bringing Viking Ship To Chicago Open Air Festival [News]
text:
Amon Amarth Bringing Viking Ship to Chicago Open Air Festival Including live Viking fighting too! UG editor. Music lover. Constant searcher of something interesting and unique. Posted 15 hours ago 13 
Amon Amarth will take the stage at Toyota Park in Bridgeview, Illinois on Sunday, July 16th in support of their latest album "Jomsviking," bringing something special to the Chicago Open Air Festival attendees. 
The band's full production plans include an infamous life-size replica of a Viking ship hull and live Viking fighting! 
The setup will pay homage to the band's Swedish roots and the Jomsvikings, a legendary sect of Viking mercenaries. Amon Amarth stated: "Chicago Open Air: We are sailing our long ship directly for you in July. We look forward to burning and sacking your little festival and dancing on the ashes. You have been forewarned."
The Chicago Open Air will also feature over 40 performances, including Ozzy Osbourne, KISS, Korn, Rob Zombie, Slayer, Stone Sour, Megadeth, Lamb of God, Meshuggah, and many more.
